        - Following Text: "![Celestial Pear .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/46/Celestial_Pear_.jpg)| Celestial Pear | Rare | Ingredient | Found in Snowhill Path - Mirrormere from Celestial Pear trees in The New West and onwards
![Tree Pearl .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/67/Tree_Pearl_.jpg)| Tree Pearl | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Pagoda Realm - Outside The Wheel in The New West and onwards"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts two vibrant, red spherical objects encased in delicate, web-like structures, likely representing an in-game ingredient from *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the surrounding context, the image is associated with rare or uncommon items, such as Snake-Head Mushrooms or Monkey-Head Fungus, which serve as ingredients for gameplay progression. These items are found in specific locations or obtained through interactions with vendors.
